Contradict fact: The claim that the Covid-19 death rate is lower than the flu death rate contradicts the fact stated by multiple international health experts.
Understate: The claim understates the Covid-19 death rate by comparing it to the flu death rate.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or data to back up the assertion.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Covid-19 death rate is lower than the flu death rate without providing any basis for this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations provided by health experts who state that the Covid-19 death rate is higher than the flu death rate.
